snippet: The campaign now being waged against Senator Chuck Hagel’s nomination as secretary of defense echoes his dispute with fellow Republicans over the invasion of Iraq in 2003.
abstract: Campaign being waged against former Sen Chuck Hagel's nomination for defense secretary echoes his dispute with fellow Republicans over 2003 invasion of Iraq; it is also dramatic return to public stage by neoconservatives whose worldview remains powerful undercurrent in Republican Party and in national debate about United States' relationship with Israel and Middle East.
lead_paragraph: The campaign now being waged against Senator Chuck Hagel’s nomination as secretary of defense echoes his dispute with fellow Republicans over the invasion of Iraq in 2003.

headline.seo: Old Foes Lead Charge Against Chuck Hagel
headline.main: Hawks on Iraq Prepare for War Again, Against Hagel
headline.print_headline: Hawks on Iraq At War Again, Against Hagel
